document_data.name: Ariton Delmis
document_data.History:
Ariton was a longtime member of the Riders, fighting the [[Zhentarim]] together with [[Randal Morn]] for a very long time. In 1369 DR, he was the second-in-command of the group and the leader of the cavalry. He was the only survivor on an ambush in which Randal was kidnapped by the [[Zhent]]s.

Afterward, he keep control of the Riders and, with the help of [[Elminster Aumar]] and [[Lhaeo]], recruited some adventurers to find his leader. Ariton commanded the last battle against the invaders in [[Dagger Falls]] and afterward he welcomed Randal back to the freed dale.
